page.title: 09Other shops in Ipswich .
page.content: W.H.Smith, Westgate St. W.H.Smith is situated in the centre of town. Again it contains mostly stationary but has other things for example books, computers, newspapers, folders, cards and electronic games . The main attraction at the moment are computers, they range from small Sinclair ZX81's which are useful for home computing to big BBC computers which are better for business work . W.H.Smith has just been enlarged . Debenhams, Corn Hill. Debenhams is a department store .It consists of three floors, ground floor, 1st floor and 2nd floor. The ground floor has jewellery, clothes and perfumes etc.The 1st floor contains mostly bedroom and lounge suites. The top floor has toys, kitchenware and material, also on this floor there is a cafeteria called "Springles."
